# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. KEY LEADERS IN BOLIVIAN PRIVATE SECTOR WHO MIGHT INFLUENCE GOB
AND PUBLIC REGARDING FOOD AND POPULATION OBJECTIVES ARE GENERALLY
ASSOCIATED WITH "PRO FAMILIA," AN IPPF AFFILIATE ORGANIZATION. ITS
PRESIDENT, DR LUIS KUSHNER, M.D. AND LUIS LLANO, WHO NOW WITH
ORGANIZATION AND HAS BEEN CHIEF DEMOGRAPHER OF GOB'S NATIONAL
FAMILY CENTER (CENAFA), CAN BE REACHED AT PRO FAMILIA'S OFFICE,
CASILLA 1837, LA PAZ


2. OTHER KEY LEADERS, INCLUDING THOSE WITH SOME GOB CONNECTIONS, ARE:
LIC ANTONIO CISNEROS, DIRECTOR, CENTRO DE INVESTIGACIONES
SOCIALES, ACADEMIA NACIONAL DE CIENCIAS SOCIALES, CASILLA
6931, LA PAZ:
DR JULIO MENDEZ, DIRECTOR DEPARTMIENTO MATERNO/INFANTIL,
MINISTERIO DE PREVISION SOCIAL Y SALUD PUBLICA, LA PAZ:
DRA, NELLY PAREDES, ASSOCIACION BOLIVANA DE EDUCACION SEXUAL,
C/O MINISTERIO DE PREVISION SOCIAL Y SALUD PUBLICA, LA PAZ.








 291846Z


3. EMBASSY KNOWS OF NO RPT NO EFFORT TO ESTABLISH SUBJECT




                    

                  

COMMITTEES IN BOLIVIA UP TO PRESENT TIME.
BREWIN
